verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
The Comforter has come,
The Comforter has come!
The Holy Ghost from heav’n,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
The Father’s promise giv’n;
Oh, spread the tidings ‘round,
Wherever man is found
The Comforter has come!

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Oh, spread the tidings ‘round,
wherever man is found,
Wherever human hearts
and human woes abound;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Let ev’ry Christian tongue
proclaim the joyful sound:
The Comforter has come!

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
The long, long night is past,
the morning breaks at last;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
And hushed the dreadful wail and fury of the blast,
As o’er the golden hills the day advances fast!
The Comforter has come!

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Lo, the great King of kings,
with healing in His wings,

verse.name: v3b
v4a
verse.lines:
O boundless love divine!
how shall this tongue of mine

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
To wond’ring mortals tell the matchless grace divine
That I, a child of hell,
should in His image shine!
The Comforter has come!

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines:
Sing, till the echoes fly
above the vaulted sky,
And all the saints above
to all below reply,

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines:
In strains of endless love,
the song that ne’er will die:
The Comforter has come!
